metadata.title: Unattended Debian/Ubuntu Installation
metadata.description:
Learn how to use a preseed file to automatically answer installation
questions and enable Packer to connect to your Debian instance.

outlineItems.title: When To Use a Preseed File
How to make a Preseed File
Where to put the preseed file
What does Packer need the preseed file to do?

mdxSource.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={};const MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components,...props}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...props,components:components,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Unattended Debian/Ubuntu installation is done via "preseed" files`),mdx("p",null,`These files are generally named "preseed.cfg". They are not
Packer-specific tools, though we do make use of them.`),mdx("p",null,`If, after following this guide, you're still having issues getting a preseed
file working, We recommend you read the official documentation on
`,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"https://wiki.debian.org/DebianInstaller/Preseed"},`preseed files`),`.`),mdx("p",null,`The guide here is hopefully enough to get you started, but isn't a replacement
for the official documentation.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"when-to-use-a-preseed-file"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#when-to-use-a-preseed-file","aria-label":"when to use a preseed file permalink"},`\xbb`),`When To Use a Preseed File`),mdx("p",null,`If you are installing the operating system from a mounted iso as part of
your Packer build, you will need to use a preseed file. For example, you're
building an image from scratch using the `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/packer/plugins/builders/vmware/iso"},`vmware-iso`),`,
`,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/packer/plugins/builders/virtualbox/iso"},`virtualbox-iso`),`, or
`,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/packer/plugins/builders/hyperv/iso"},`hyperv-iso`),` builders.`),mdx("p",null,`If you are not installing the operating system, you won't need to provide a
preseed file. If you are using a pre-built image in a cloud, you don't need to
worry about preseed files.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"how-to-make-a-preseed-file"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#how-to-make-a-preseed-file","aria-label":"how to make a preseed file permalink"},`\xbb`),`How to make a Preseed File`),mdx("p",null,`You can either start from an example preseed file from a known repo (take a look
at the examples links below), or you can start with the official `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"https://www.debian.org/releases/stable/example-preseed.txt"},`example
preseed`),`, and
comment or uncomment the options as you need them.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"where-to-put-the-preseed-file"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#where-to-put-the-preseed-file","aria-label":"where to put the preseed file permalink"},`\xbb`),`Where to put the preseed file`),mdx("p",null,`The `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`-iso`),` builders mentioned above all have an `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`http_dir`),` or an `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`http_content`),`
option. Any file inside of your `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`http_dir`),` or `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`http_content`),` will be served on a
local fileserver for your virtual machine to be able to access. One very common
use for this directory is to use it to provide your preseed file.`),mdx("p",null,`You then reference the file using a `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`boot_command`),` to kick off the installation.
In the example below, see how the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`preseed/url`),` command line option is being
used in the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`/install/vmlinuz command`),`. The `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`{{ .HTTPIP }}`),` and
`,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`{{ .HTTPPort }}`),` options are special Packer template options that will get set
by Packer to point to the HTTP server we create, so that your boot command can
access it. For an example of a working boot_command, see the Examples section
below. For more information on how boot_command works, see the
boot_command section of the docs for whatever builder you are using.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"what-does-packer-need-the-preseed-file-to-do"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#what-does-packer-need-the-preseed-file-to-do","aria-label":"what does packer need the preseed file to do permalink"},`\xbb`),`What does Packer `,mdx("em",{parentName:"h2"},`need`),` the preseed file to do?`),mdx("p",null,`Packer needs the preseed file to handle any questions that would normally be
answered interactively during a Debian installation.`),mdx("p",null,`If you want to be able to use provisioners, the preseed file must also install
SSH so that Packer can connect to the instance.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"examples"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#examples","aria-label":"examples permalink"},`\xbb`),`Examples`),mdx("p",null,`A very minimal example of a preseed file can be found below. Much of this was
copied from the official example-preseed shared above. Notice that we are
installing ssh via `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`d-i pkgsel/include string openssh-server`),` and configuring
a username so that Packer will be able to connect.`),mdx("p",null,`You need to make sure that your mirror settings are properly configured for your
specific distribution of Debian.`),mdx("pre",{"className":"language-shell"},mdx("code",{parentName:"pre","className":"language-shell"},mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# Preseeding only locale sets language, country and locale.`),`
`,`d-i debian-installer/locale string en_US`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# Keyboard selection.`),`
`,`d-i console-setup/ask_detect boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`false`),`
`,`d-i keyboard-configuration/xkb-keymap `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token keyword"},`select`),` us`,`
`,`
`,`choose-mirror-bin mirror/http/proxy string`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`### Clock and time zone setup`),`
`,`d-i clock-setup/utc boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`d-i time/zone string UTC`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# Avoid that last message about the install being complete.`),`
`,`d-i finish-install/reboot_in_progress note`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# This is fairly safe to set, it makes grub install automatically to the MBR`),`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# if no other operating system is detected on the machine.`),`
`,`d-i grub-installer/only_debian boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# This one makes grub-installer install to the MBR if it also finds some other`),`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# OS, which is less safe as it might not be able to boot that other OS.`),`
`,`d-i grub-installer/with_other_os boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`### Mirror settings`),`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# If you select ftp, the mirror/country string does not need to be set.`),`
`,`d-i mirror/country string manual`,`
`,`d-i mirror/http/directory string /ubuntu/`,`
`,`d-i mirror/http/hostname string archive.ubuntu.com`,`
`,`d-i mirror/http/proxy string`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`### Partitioning`),`
`,`d-i partman-auto/method string lvm`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# This makes partman automatically partition without confirmation.`),`
`,`d-i partman-md/confirm boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`d-i partman-partitioning/confirm_write_new_label boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`d-i partman/choose_partition `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token keyword"},`select`),` finish`,`
`,`d-i partman/confirm boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`d-i partman/confirm_nooverwrite boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`### Account setup`),`
`,`d-i passwd/user-fullname string vagrant`,`
`,`d-i passwd/user-uid string `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token number"},`1000`),`
`,`d-i passwd/user-password password vagrant`,`
`,`d-i passwd/user-password-again password vagrant`,`
`,`d-i passwd/username string vagrant`,`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# The installer will warn about weak passwords. If you are sure you know`),`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# what you're doing and want to override it, uncomment this.`),`
`,`d-i user-setup/allow-password-weak boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`true`),`
`,`d-i user-setup/encrypt-home boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`false`),`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`### Package selection`),`
`,`tasksel tasksel/first standard`,`
`,`d-i pkgsel/include string openssh-server build-essential`,`
`,`d-i pkgsel/install-language-support boolean `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token boolean"},`false`),`
`,`
`,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`# disable automatic package updates`),`
`,`d-i pkgsel/update-policy `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token keyword"},`select`),` none`,`
`,`d-i pkgsel/upgrade `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token keyword"},`select`),` full-upgrade`,`
`)),mdx("p",null,`Here's an example of the vmware-iso builder being used to call this preseed.
In this case, it is assumed that the file is saved as preseed.cfg inside of a
directory called "http", and Packer is being called from the directory
containing the "http" directory.`),mdx("pre",{"className":"language-hcl"},mdx("code",{parentName:"pre","className":"language-hcl"},`  `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"builders"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`[`),`
`,`    `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`{`),`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"boot_command"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`[`),`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"<esc><wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"<esc><wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"<enter><wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"/install/vmlinuz<wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`" initrd=/install/initrd.gz"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`" auto-install/enable=true"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`" debconf/priority=critical"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`" preseed/url=http://{{ .HTTPIP }}:{{ .HTTPPort }}/preseed_2.cfg<wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`" -- <wait>"`),`,`,`
`,`        `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"<enter><wait>"`),`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`]`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"boot_wait"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"10s"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"guest_os_type"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"ubuntu-64"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"http_directory"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"http"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"iso_checksum"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"file:///Users/mmarsh/dev/repro_cases/packer_cache/shasums.txt"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"iso_url"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/releases/14.04.1/ubuntu-14.04.1-server-amd64.iso"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"shutdown_command"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"echo 'vagrant' | sudo -S shutdown -P now"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"ssh_password"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"vagrant"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"ssh_username"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"vagrant"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"ssh_wait_timeout"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"10000s"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"tools_upload_flavor"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"linux"`),`,`,`
`,`      `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token property"},`"type"`),`: `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token string"},`"vmware-iso"`),`
`,`    `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`}`),`
`,`  `,mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token punctuation"},`]`),`,`,`
`)),mdx("p",null,`For more functional examples of a debian preseeded installation, you can see the

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Packer Integrations.
